title: Upper Delaware Scenic & Recreational River: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      River use is permitted 24 hours a day, year-round, unless closed due to flooding, ice floes or other hazardous conditions. Public river accesses closed 10:00 pm to 5:00 am. Most private boat rental companies and campgrounds are open mid-April through October. Zane Grey Museum135 Scenic DriveLackawaxen, PA  18435Phone: 570-685-4871Memorial Day - Labor Day -  Daily: 10:00 am- 5:00 pmSeptember 1 - September 30 - 10:00 am - 5:00 pmOctober - Saturday and Sunday 3 & 4, 10 & 11, 17 &18 - 10:00 am - 5:00 pm  Closed for the winter season after October 18 2015.The museum will open for the 2016 season on Memorial Day weekend. Roebling Bridge Lackawaxen, PA to Minisink Ford, NYBridge open 24 hours a day.Towpath Trail is open year round. Roebling Bridge Tollhouse4225 State Route 97Barryville, NY 12719On the Minisink Ford, NY side of the bridgeDaily -  10:00 am - 4:00 pm
